meanings.definition: (古代ギリシャの)三年ごとのディオニュソス祭
meanings.english_definition: (in ancient Greece) a triennial festival of Dionysus.

examples.sentence: The Trieterics were celebrated every three years.
examples.translation: トリエテリア祭は三年ごとに祝われた。

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek τριετηρικός (triēterikós), from τριετηρία (triētería, “space of three years”), from τρι- (tri-, “three”) + ἔτος (étos, “year”).
